backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Contains metadata for a feature update replacing the BidArena logo, listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of various frontend files including styles, config, content data, components, and the App entry.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main landing page component with header, sections, navigation, and updated logo reference.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsCaro: Implements a testimonials carousel with navigation controls and fixed-height cards.
frontend/src/content/rates.ts: Exports rate option definitions for 4, 8, and 16 team pricing tiers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines cricket-themed OKLCH color tokens and global typography rules for Tailwind.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root and wraps the app with InternetIdentityProvider and React Query client.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current version, features, requirements, and state for building the BidArena landing page.
